info.condition: Excellent, with vibrant colors and well-preserved texture
info.details: A captivating painting that depicts a majestic vessel sailing through tumultuous waves amidst a dramatic sky. The artist skillfully captures the raw power and beauty of the sea, while also conveying a sense of adventure and uncertainty.
A painting that portrays a serene and vibrant landscape filled with lush greenery.

A mesmerizing painting that captures the vibrant spirit of the traditional Filipino boat called a vinta. The artist skillfully employs oil on canvas to bring forth a stunning portrayal of this iconic vessel. The colors used in the artwork are rich and lively, reflecting the vivid hues often associated with vintas.

A captivating painting that explores the allure and mystery of masks. Created using vibrant acrylic paints on canvas, the artist skillfully brings to life a visually striking and imaginative composition.

An extraordinary mixed media painting that transports viewers into a realm of ethereal beauty and tranquility. The artist has employed a variety of mediums on canvas to create a visually stunning and immersive artwork.
